New Records: Sybrand Engelbrecht and Logan van Beek put together a Cricket World Cup record 130 run partnership for the seventh wicket
Sybrand Engelbrecht and Logan van Beek scored their career-best scores of 70 and 59 respectively
Key Match Events: Aryan Dutt took two wickets in the first Powerplay to trouble Sri Lanka's chase
Pathum Nissanka scored a brisk 54 before being dismissed by Paul van Meekeren
Sadeera Samarawickrama scored an unbeaten 91* to guide Sri Lanka to victory
Pre-Game Insights: Netherlands were backing themselves to make a huge impact at the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023 after their rousing victory over South Africa
Sri Lanka had lost all three of their previous matches in the tournament
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka coach Anton Roux acknowledged the importance of the win, stating that it was a'massive boost' for the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the BRSABVE Cricket Stadium in Lucknow, India
Others: The Dutch had to battle through a difficult early period as Sri Lanka quicks Rajitha and Madushanka moved the ball through the air
